dict.string: Copyright 2008 Kosada Incorporated. All rights reserved.

This patch loads a 3D Object for rendering in the Kineme 3D Object Renderer.
Currently supported formats: * FBX * DAE * MD2 * DXF * OBJ * 3DS
OBJ can take a long time for large/complex moels.
http://kineme.net/
File to Load (DAE, DXF, FBX, MD2, OBJ, 3DS)
Centers the object about the origin (0,0,0)
Scales the object to fit in a bounding box from -1 to 1. Implies Center.
removes redundant vertices, making Smooth blend across coincident surfaces.
Smooths the normals of the model to give it a non-faceted look. This also builds an object's smooth cache, accelerating smoothing later on (i.e., after deformations).
First Object found in the file
